channel.title: Append to Craft Note with date - breaks the Markdown import of the first line of a note
channel.description:
Hello,
Using @FlohGro (you're a champ!) action to Append/Prepend to Craft Note with date overall works great, but the date insertion breaks the Markdown import of the first line of the note. Screen attached.
I'd like to add a line break after the date to prevent this from happening, but I don't know anything about scripting drafts (yet).
Could you guys help me out with this one? Maybe I've did something wrong?
